00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <math.h>
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 
00023 /*  LEAP_GREGORIAN  --  Is a given year in the Gregorian calendar a leap year ? */
00024 
00025 static int leap_gregorian(int year)
00026 {
00027     return ((year % 4) == 0) &&
00028             (!(((year % 100) == 0) && ((year % 400) != 0)));
00029 }
00030 
00031 /*  GREGORIAN_TO_JD  --  Determine Julian day number from Gregorian calendar date */
00032 
00033 #define GREGORIAN_EPOCH 1721425.5
00034 
00035 static double gregorian_to_jd(int year, int month, int day)
00036 {
00037     return (GREGORIAN_EPOCH - 1.0) +
00038            (365.0 * (year - 1.0)) +
00039            floor((year - 1.0) / 4.0) +
00040            (-floor((year - 1.0) / 100.0)) +
00041            floor((year - 1.0) / 400.0) +
00042            floor((((367.0 * month) - 362.0) / 12.0) +
00043            ((month <= 2) ? 0 :
00044                                (leap_gregorian(year) ? -1 : -2)
00045            ) +
00046            day);
00047 }
00048 
00061 MTKt_status MtkCalToJulian(
00062   int year, 
00063   int month, 
00064   int day, 
00065   int hour, 
00066   int min, 
00067   int sec, 
00068   double *jd  )
00069 {
00070   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00071 
00072   if (jd == NULL)
00073     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00074 
00075   if (year == 0 || month <= 0 || day <= 0 || hour < 0 || min < 0 || sec < 0)
00076     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00077 
00078   *jd = gregorian_to_jd(year, month, day) +
00079                (floor(sec + 60 * (min + 60 * hour) + 0.5) / 86400.0);
00080 
00081   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00082 
00083 ERROR_HANDLE:
00084   return status_code;
00085 }
